values:
So she said what's the problem baby
What's the problem I don't know 
Well maybe I'm in love (love) 
Think about it every time
I think about it
Can't stop thinking 'bout it

How much longer will it take to cure this
Just to cure it cause I can't ignore it if it's love (love) 
Makes me wanna turn around and face me but I don't know nothing 'bout love 

Come on, come on 
Turn a little faster
Come on, come on 
The world will follow after
Come on, come on 
Cause everybody's after love

So I said I'm a snowball running 
Running down into the spring that's coming all this love 
Melting under blue skies 
Belting out sunlight 
Shimmering love 

Well baby I surrender 
To the strawberry ice cream
Never ever end of all this love
Well I didn't mean to do it 
But there's no escaping your love

These lines of lightning 
Mean we're never alone, 
Never alone, no, no 

Come on, Come on
Move a little closer 
Come on, Come on
I want to hear you whisper
Come on, Come on 
Settle down inside my love

Come on, come on 
Jump a little higher
Come on, come on
If you feel a little lighter
Come on, come on 
We were once
Upon a time in love 

We're accidentally in love 
Accidentally in love (x7) 

Accidentally 

I'm In Love, I'm in Love, 
I'm in Love, I'm in Love, 
I'm in Love, I'm in Love,
Accidentally (X 2) 

Come on, come on
Spin a little tighter
Come on, come on 
And the world's a little brighter
Come on, come on 
Just get yourself inside her 

Love ...I'm in love

I GOT THE BOOTS I GOT THE BOOTS I GOT THE BOOTS!!!!!!!!!

maya ist happy :D

lol

just ordered the bye bye kitty hoodie against my better judgement.

looks like I'll be living off pasta/soup this month...


oh well.

The bookmarks in my wants folder are getting ridiculous, so ive decided to list them here... much easier to handle

Euro Size 38: New Rock M 373 Black Planing Ankle Boot

Poizen Industries- Bye Bye Kitty Void Hoodie

Living Dead Souls- Spiderweb and Lace Mini Dress with Netting

Vollers Corset- Style V1844u- Velvet- Black

Vollers Corset- Style V1110- Brocade w/ Panels and Trim- Plum

Queen of Darkness- Long Sleeved Safety Pin Top

Queen Of Darkness- Black Bondage Mini Skirt With Zips

Lovebomb- Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Chain Top w/ Barbed Wire

Mercy- Gloria Corset Jacket- Black Satin w/ Flocked Pattern -im not sure if I like this or not, its hard to tell online... pretty though...

Lip Service- Beyond the Thunderdome- Assymetrical Mini

Limb- Stretchy Black Armwarmers with Ripped Holey Effect

The problem with the skirts is tho, that theyre hard to know about without trying them on, which is quite annoying :( which is partly true of the other stuff too but to a lesser extent... *sighs*

oh well I'm def getting the boots and the hoodie, I'll see about the other stuff...

Now, better go work or I'm screwed.

WANTS SO SO SO BAD:

http://www.kinkyangel.co.uk/index.php?main_page=product_info&products_id=1158

http://www.kinkyangel.co.uk/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=166&products_id=3254

the boots are so beautiful... i so hope this sunday is a success... (> <

Still not sure whether or not to get tickets... will have to decide soon tho else they'll def sell out.

ugh i shud prolly work... in fact i shud def work. better make dinner and try and make some headway.

recent addictions: Funeral For A Friend, Finch, Noel Fielding, The Mighty Boosh!

tis all ive looked for on youtube these past few days, eps of the mighty boosh and noel fielding, and all ive been listening to is funeral for a friend and finch... really good bands though. and the mighty boosh is hilarious! XD seriously, anybody who hasn't seen the mighty boosh yet ought to go to youtube now and look for it, tis bloody brilliant.

back to boosh eps now x

Maya ist happy bunny but also ill which makes me less happy than i shud be...

at home due to this, probably wont be back in uni til monday :( (Fri: Feedback, Sat: PT nooooooo!) i seriously hope i am better by friday night... tho i prolly shudnt go even if i feel a bit better coz i REALLY dont wana miss the RocSoc Halloween Pub Crawl next Wednesday!!!!! XD will be bloody amazing, and im pleased with my costume... so, yeh. under no circumstances will i miss THAT thank you very much!

gah i feel so bad tho. and it doesnt help that my stupid cat chose this moment in time to bring in a bloody mouse... it made the most horrible crunchy noises....... (> < it was just... horrible...
and yeh i know its a cats nature and all that, but... did she have to choose now??? i feel bad enough without coping with that (> <

meeshk.....

well i finally bought the film for my camera today, so i just need to hope it doesnt rain tmr and go take photos rly... damn rain. i love the smell of it, and the sound, and the way it looks after its stopped raining... and walking in it when its only light can be nice. but cycling back in it when it is heavy and you are tired is not fun at all..... (< <  me=drowned rat on returning home. seriously. i actually had water dripping off me.

and argh rly duno if i want the dolls now :s firstly, they are ridiculously expensive... secondly if i ever decided it was worth it and did get one, i suspect it wud get photographed sometimes and possibly get its clothes changed occasionally... but i can so see it just sitting on my shelf doing nothing for aaages. But then they are so pretty... especially yder. argh. i think i shud stick to my shana buys for a while since i actually use the stuff i get from there... everyone loves what ive bought so far :) be warned ppl, most likely shana will be the source of all your presents this christmas... >: D mwa-ha-ha

anyways yes. i think dolls will go off the list of things wanted for now. i dont want them badly enough for it to be worth it... and this art course is so damn expensive!! i mean i knew it wud be... but still. its mad.. which reminds me i shud check daily info for jobs...

sleep (- -

Dolls Update~

YDER doll
YDER doll special
SOO-DARK ELF doll (maybe..)

umm... other than that not sure. kinda like the kid delf girl ani.

although im more intrigued by these than anything, im not sure if i actually want one.. not much of a dolls person its just that some of these are so pretty!

aaand now im guna be late for class. this always happens if i wake up early!! (> < argh

i believe i said i would post pics, so as promised, here is a hat photo, a green hair photo (same as my profile) and my JD t-shirt

 

I might stick with the green for a while, I'm quite pleased with it :) and it clashes with things less! :p

internet's down at home which is intensely annoying, hence my recent lack of updates.

and it's raining.

and im sleepy (- -

on the upside, my birthday present from dad arrived! actually it's presents, but the main one is this VERY cool hat, which my sister says was designed by dad probably! :D according to her, he said he was going to design hers, and therefore prolly my hat too, then give the designs to a friend who recently opened a hat store. it is sooooo cool, i will upload a photo as soon as internet is up at home again (> w <)

also, my hair is green. GREEN. tropical forest green according to the packet. its scary. apparently it looks good, and i don't actually dislike the color so its ok, but still, will take some getting used to (< < again i will upload photos as soon as it is possible. and yes i know i said that about the JD t-shirt and i have yet to do that, but i will do that at the same time as hat and hair photo taking.

thats all i have to update on at the moment. aside from YAY karaoke tonight! :D hope there's good music.

Fire drills at 7:30. thats just inhuman. and cruel. it hasnt even woken me up, and im cold, so all in all pretty useless really. ugh. at least i get to do lettering today. need to leave in an hour and a half, but ive been up all night watching greys anatomy and 'working', so im fairly exhausted. and, the work isnt even complete. i figure il just bring it in tomorrow. ive done the photomontage we're meant to do tomorrow already, so i shud be done quite early, i hope..

SLEEP is needed. though i do wana go to SPAM tonight... supposed to be a christmas rehearsal, so shud be a laugh lol. oh well, il nap for a few hours beforehand or something. wish i had someone to nap with though, wud be much more fun...

guna shower now me-thinks. oh, and for those of you that read this, i have a question, which is should i dye my hair a dark turquoisey color? i think the shade i was looking at was manic panics enchanted forest. anyway, comments on whether it wud suit me or not wud be appreciated, i wud get just get hot hot pink but my pink hair clashes with my red scarves and tops :(

I forgot to say yesterday that more of my stuff from shana logic arrived! here are some pics :)



here are links to the items themselves: lego earrings, mini record earrings, nurse-y double layer scarf

<3 shana, il probably give in and buy more stuff later in the month :)

Last night was possibly one of the best, and most random nights out ive had in a while... and friday wasn't too bad either as nights out go :)

my friends band (called Focal Point i think?) was pretty good, they played as part of a festival it seems, but it was so strange to see art student rob be guitarist rob...

went to feedback next, lots fun, though the music wasn't as good as last time, but we met and talked to lots of people which was nice :) AND I somehow managed to drink 5 JD shots (I bought 6 but gave one to a friend), and so got 6 JD dollars :D which on Friday I couldn't turn into a T-shirt sadly, but I asked at PT last night and they happened to have one left in exactly my size! so im quite happy now really, il take a picture and show it off soon :)

friday night was mad though as i had to go home, but we only got back at around 3/4ish... and then i needed to pack and cycle home right after! which meant i ended up getting home at something like 7:30am... then got up at 10 again to go to the family reunion. which was quite nice, got to see aunts/uncles/cousins etc. 

went to PT at 9pm, just missing happy hour which was a bit annoying. Josh etc were already there though, so we werent alone :) met a bunch of his friends from college which was fun, everyone was all friendly and chatty :)

So yeh, basically stayed in PT drinking/talking/dancing/playing games til 3am :p so much fun, I should go to PT more often...

http://shanalogic.com/wordpress/?p=526

see me be on shana logic :) I should post in a pic of me w/ my heart padlock choker too... lol.

aside from that, my cold appears to be better (yay!) but I've also heard more bad things which isn't much fun... meh.

oh well. going out tomorrow at least, I shall be seeing a friend of mines band, and also going to feedback, which will be fun I hope... though I'm now really short on cash, which means drinking will be very restricted (bah)

oh yes, and then I'm guna be seeing relatives on saturday. long drive, family reunion, and small children... that'll be interesting with a hangover...

I think I've posted here alot more since moving into halls... probably coz i have more time to waste :p lol i rly dont but whatever...

Favourites, I think was what I was guna post about today? so here goes:

FAVOURITES

color: pink, black, silver, deep red, purple, blue

outfit: strap top, jeans/skirt, boots. maybe arm warmers, hat, jacket and scarf too.

pasttime: depending on the mood... DSing, doodling, painting, wandering, tara-ing

perfume: definately my Black XS <3 (sorry samourai woman and angel heart)

item of make-up: black eyeliner

soft toy: Ice bat first <3 then my piglet and my jack :)

flower: Deep red, velvety roses like the ones mum got me for my birthday

animal: cat

actor: Viggo Mortensen in LOTR <3, Johnny Depp

actress: Judi Dench

shop: shana logic :p

book: Wuthering Heights, His Dark Materials, Pride and Prejudice

film: Lord of the Rings trilogy, Pirates of the Caribbean 1 & 2, the Lion King

game console: DS, but if I had a PS2 or Wii i wud probs love that more.

game: prolly the phoenix wright series, final fantasy, and chocobo tales

camera brand: canon

computer brand: apple

phone brand: sony ericsson

internet browser: firefox and/or explorer

instant messaging system: msn, definately, unless i wana actually talk, in which case skype.

community site: Facebook

blogging site: LJ

art site: deviant art

manga artist: CLAMP, Yazawa Ai

illustrator: Kanahei, Tim Burton, Kay Nielsen

game OSTs: most of Final Fantasy, Granado Espada,

film OSTs: Pans Labyrinth, Shrek, Pirates of the Caribbean, Phantom of the Opera, Lord of the Rings

anime OSTs: Escaflowne, Tsubasa Chronicles

spring: cherry blossoms

summer: summer festivals, fireworks, watermelons

autumn: autumn leaves

winter: snow, christmas, new year, kotatsu

weather: the smell of the rain, the way things look at night after rainfall, the sunlight through the leaves, newly fallen thick snow, days when you can see the rays of light coming through white clouds

moments: when your hand is held softly, as though you're something fragile that could easily be broken and lost.


umm.... that's all I'm coming up with for now. besides which I wana watch LOTR <3 so I'm going now, methinks... goodnight all.

Why is Luts so expensive..? :(

I love this YDER doll... I'm guna be saving for months though... :( hope they don't run out. If I can wait long enough might go for this YDER doll special instead. But then my level of patience isn't very high, so I'll probs end up just getting the regular one if any.

Also quite like el, and the sleeping vampire woosoo. Can't decide whether I like soo-dark human or not yet... it's nice but I don't think it quite makes my wishlist.

So yay, now I have a doll wishlist to go with my games and shana wishlists. The second of which has once again had items deleted from it coz I can buy things online now! :D an ability which really should be excercised alot less coz my brain doesnt seem to really count expenditures that are either in foreign currency or digital currency. Shana Logic, being an American site, does both, which means my sense of how much I'm spending is severely impaired. But, meh, I'm getting things :) retail therapy is a great thing, truly. And having parcels arrive for you is kinda exciting :p

anywho I had better go, seeing as I'm still in PJs and I'm meant to have been working today, and im going out this evening.

Finished off my Kahlua today, need to buy Baileys for my grasshoppers, and jack daniels to drink with my coke... oh yeh and cream, and bread so I actually have something to eat other than free pizza hand outs for lunch (today i had free pizza and popcorn for lunch, I love freshers fair!)

I ought really to work but i can't motivate myself... everything sucks.

At least I got my sketchbook out though, which is progress. Can't say I like monoprinting much though... it's ok, but I need more than a day to actually enjoy it... especially as it wasn't even a day, just a mere 2~3 hours or so...


Joined the Japanese, Film, and Alternative Rock societies today, and got sooo many freebies :D MIGHT sign up for snowsports tomorrow but I don't think I'll actually beable to make any of the events, cash/time wise, so I might pass... shame as they had a great deal on a trip in January :( only 335 pounds? I think, for a weeks holiday snowboarding/skiing, with a weeks pass for all the ski lifts, and hotel fees included. I forgot where the destination was but it looked so good...

meh, though, I'd rather go to Japan than go snowboarding this winter to be honest, even if my friends are all busy with Uni entrance exams... I would hope I could see at least Manami and Takumi at some point, if only for a day. And I'll get to go to Harajuku and stock up on my wierd and wonderful Japanese goodies :D

I'll need to go with a practically empty suitcase though if I'm guna fit all the manga etc that I wana buy in there, and bring it back :p ahhh well. I'll sort it out, somehow...........

bin nearly 4 hours now. ugh. and my tarrie is nowhere in sight.....

...am I up at 7:40am reading up on monoprinting..?

it's not fair, we art foundationers don't get a proper freshers week! we have to use our work and research time to go to the freshers events, and use our lunches to get anywhere near the freshers fair!!! its bollocks, I get that we have alot to get through, but we should at least get freshers week off... meh. At least I sorta know what societies I wana join. and I know I'm not alone since the rest of my flatmates are like, f*** it, we're going out! so yeh... its fine :p though at this rate I won't get my license to occupy handed in til the end of this week... oops.

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!



hahahahahahaahhaahh!!!!! lolz yey funzies for mayhe todays :) lots of funsies tho bad start but mehm, it was fiunne, i wasnt leat ]D

and its not todaty its yesterday coz its saturday nouw but i left oin friday so yehhhh................ i lik ePT :) Tom was nice, i like tom. he was lots friendly :)

and dill was nice, and the other girl hus name i duno seemed friendly roo. but i never hearx her name. oh well. we all danced it was nice :) i like dancing :) as long as old men in suits arent oggling at m arse anyway/ thats qanoying,. apparentky there was someone doing thhat tonight which was like, ewwwwwwww............

byut we left after that and returned with males so we were safe ^^ oh and ive decided i like mai tais coz tehy taste like shisha and are generally  quite yums/ and only 4 pounds!!!

that reminds me,muast keeep accounts of money spent tonight. forgttt already. i think bus n drinks etc are it ansd i owe 3.50 (>>  ohhhhh welllllll/


Maya :) is a Dingbat Fluffpot Reeehaaarooo :p

haha

not sure what to think anymore...

anyway, i spent at least 5 hours on this damn doll, and this is all I've managed to get done!

this is the doll at 10am

and this is the doll as it was at 4:30pm

all ive done is spend the day wrapping wool around the wires!! thats all and it takes so long, and is so tedious... (< <

I got some pretty wool for my hair though, and beads to do swirly patterns with... and some nice velvet for the 'skin' i guess you would call it? of the doll.

will probably take me forever but il try at least... ^^;

Calmed down a bit now I think.. should get to work on my doll but i just don't feel motivated... would much rather complete phoenix wright :p which I think I have nearly completed btw, am on part 3-1 right now... hehe :)

ack damn doll i need more time... grrr. and i need sleep...

oh and my milk has somehow managed to go off, and I only bought it a few days ago... expected it to last longer but it's gone all lumpy :s which I have to say I'm confused about as it's only been about a week since it was opened... maybe i should get soya milk in future as it last longer. oh well, need to go do a shop at tescos anyway i think...

damn though, i wanted tea :( meh

Maya = a speck of dust.

a tiny tiny speck of dust.

with no money.

bastards.

i want money.

and alcohol for my cocktail making fun.

wana make nuts to you but cant find frangelico anywhere... damn.

also, could certain persons LEAVE ME ALONE.

thank you.

my life sucks.

yay art foundation etc I guess, and yay even with so much competition people picked out my drawings/planning sheet and said it was good... but still, meh.

although I actually mingled with fellow art students today which is progress. we sat together quite happily making our dolls...

am annoyed coz if it wasn't a week project i could SO use it as an excuse to buy a BJD...

Phoenix Wright: Trials and Tribulations update: Have completed four out of the five cases, and started the fifth tonight. Dunno what I'll do when I've completed that... try and get the remainder of the Chocobo cards I guess. And play old pokemon games... and by old I mean yellow. yes, yellow. But I don't care, it's nostalgic and I never played it, so hmph.

in fact hmph to everything, everything sucks, and I am a moron. A BLIND MORON.

and now I need a plaster thanks to my wielding of a sharp knife. bah.

My game came!!! Trials and Tribulations arrived!!!!!!! I'm so happy, probably coz it's the first time I ever ordered something off the internet... :D Makes me want to buy more... with my non-existent money... 

*sigh*

Oh yeh and a bunch of prospectuses came from all over the place which I will need to go through, and I found out yesterday I have a definate place in Halls... which is good, though I don't know my room number and I havent paid for it yet. But I'll probably start packing soon anyway... once I've torn myself away from my DS...

Oh, and another yay, should be seeing a bunch of friends tomorrow, and a class reunion from my first school has also been arranged, which should be interesting :D though I'll probably end up huddled in a corner due to not knowing how to talk to the people who see eachother all the time but who I havent seen for about 5 years now.. but oh well ^^;

(weeee!)

woohoo I've actually bought some of the games on my wishlist!!! 7 down 11 to go...

Got back from Oundle today. About a 4 hour trip but was ok. Had fun there anyways, since I hadn't seen Erik since May...

Umm yeh. Thats about it. Not much to say of late. Aside from bah, too much work...

I forgot to say, this is a song I discovered whilst in France, so thought I might share it. Video is cool as well :D

http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=i_VuIgOVWx4

x

to update on France... basically trip back was a PAIN and delayed by like 2 hours, so only got back to Oxford at about 11. meh. Got to see friends almost immediately though so yay! ^^ handed over gifts of Genepi filled chocolate and mini bottles of chartreus... can't spell that but whatever. anyway.

went home next afternoon and got my hair cut!!!!!!! its all short and scary now (> < AND then I went shopping with my Tarrie today, bought hair dye, and Aska cut Tara's hair... so now we BOTH have short hair, Tara's hair is black again, and I'm all fluorescent pink at the ends (< < should glow under UV lights now though so that'll be fun... have GOT to go clubbing :D not OC though... ugh.

Pictures will be up soon...

yaaaay I is in France :D but I'm spending 5.50 euros for an hour on this which is not so yay...

aaaanyways, here is a brief(ish) overview on what I have been up to!

-Sunday 12th August

1st full day in France!
Today we went white water rafting!!! was so so so much fun XD swam in the river briefly too... was so refreshing, and cold! Glad it was such a warm day... absolutely boiling in fact (< <  nearly got a watch tan mark on my wrist...
Spent the afternoon wandering about Venosc :) Such a pretty town... kinda like something out of Kiki's Delivery Service :) will upload pics once I return home...

-Monday 13th August

Didn't do much today, except organise skiing (for mum n aska) and snowboarding (for me :)) Went round buying/renting/booking things...
Oh! and Fez called :D might come down while I'm here apparently, should be fun if he can :D

-Tuesday 14th August

First day snowboarding!!!!!!!!!!!!

Woke up at 6 (ugh) And couldn't get on the damn T-bar... but aside from that was great :D Managed to get a little lost but it was ok. I <3 Snowboarding (>w<)
And the view was AMAZING. Didn't take my camera though.. *is annoyed*

Spent the afternoon relaxing with Chocobo Tales while Aska went off on a horse riding venture. And in the evening we had Fondue... and icecream with liqueor... hehe.. :D

-Wednesday 15th August

Second day snowboarding XD

More fun this time, as I got to snowboard more than yesterday... but the conditions weren't exactly brilliant (< < Slopes of slush as opposed to snow really ^ ^; but I got quite a few pictures and videos this time, which will be posted on my return :) Was guna go again tomorrow... but yeh, theres meant to be a thunderstorm, plus bad conditions anyway so maaaybe not ^^;

Back in England on the 18th, around 9:30... so will update further then :)

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

The water level has risen again.

It looks like some of the houses in the next road have flooding basements, and the Abingdon road has been blocked off once again.

A friend a few roads away, near the park, is having water pumped out from under her house, and the park itself is mostly underwater.

That's some pics of the park near my house, just to give you an idea...

So yeh. And apparently levels are still rising, so here's to more flood panic to look forward to! yippee.

Oh yes and someone has been hospitalised coz they got electricuted wading about in the water in the park. People have now cut off the electricity going to the park and are trying to fix the problem...

And my voice still isn't back. meh.

Just to sum up today...

'the banks of the river thames will burst sometime today'

Yay. So does that mean we will be stranded? Or just a bit wet? Or what? Coz the helpline isn't being very useful on that front apparently. Just tells you there is a flood warning for your area and you should prepare to evacuate (yay for stupid recorded messages). I need to know what parts of Grandpont will be most effected, and how bad they think it will be!

On another note, I can't work today. Which should be good, except that it means less money *sob* and I need that money to shop in France and Barca! And to get mums birthday present..... argh.

Then there's the REASON I can't work, which is that I've lost my bloody voice. Actually lost it. I can't talk above a whisper, and when I try these wierd high-pitched squeaks come out, as opposed to words (no comments there about how that's what I do anyway please). It sucks, I can't call people and talk to them when they aren't online! There is text messaging but that's not so useful when you have a limited balance left on your phone.

Argh and I really wana read the new Harry Potter book!!!!! Mum's saying I can't go to town though, even though it's not far at all and I see no reason why I can't go, get the book and come back... hmph. Well at least I have lotr...

Actually, screw it I'm getting dressed and going in to get it anyway.

I shall update later on flooding if there are any further changes to the situation. If I can anyways.

Well apparently, there is danger of flooding. And also apparently, we need to get ready to evacuate.

Actually evacuate.

wtf.

I mean really, this is so typical on so many levels.

I don't sleep for over 24 hours, then when I finally do get some sleep, early for a change, I am woken with 'Maya get ready, pack an emergency bag, we need to be prepared to evacuate!'

Then of course in the middle of all this, once its gotten to the point where I'm thoroughly awake, mum decides to inform me that I may as well sleep, as there is no point in staying awake to see if it does or doesnt flood.

Screw that I'm completely bloody awake now!!!!!!!!!!

Then after all this there is of course the fact that it is supposedly the middle of the summer, and we are being warned of floods. That is so typical England there just aren't even words....
I will be so p**sed off tmr, floods or no just because of this. ugh and I thought I would finally be back on normal (ish) sleeping patterns.......*groan*

Damn emergency packing.

Lord of the rings is actually one of the most artistically amazing films ever.

I am currently watching the making and am completely in awe... the effort and time put into it is amazing, the sets are amazing, the detail is amazing.

One of the forests is actually constructed from real trees and leaves! Well largely anyway, it's ridiculous.

If I could work doing something like that it would just be so, so great... if only I had the skill!

Ah well I guess I shall figure out what I wana do in the next year or so...

Hello all, if anyone out there actually reads this.

Went to town today to buy art materials for the Foundation Art course I shall be taking from this September.

Costs a bloody fortune.

I spent just over 90 pounds today alone on acrylics, a palette, a palette knife, brushes, a ruler, tape, a glue gun...
The list goes on.

And I still don't quite have everything on the list (< < Though if I dig around the house I'll probs find alot of it so should be fine... but still, so expensive! I shall have to try to be sparing with my materials usage... ugh.

Sarah's gone home so I'm now sitting here with nothing to do really. Though I suppose there are things I could be doing such as clarinet practise... but meh, don't really wana. I guess I'll jus curl up somewhere with my DS...

EDIT

Be it due to my low expectations or my lack of memory of the book, The Order of the Phoenix wasn't actually that bad. In fact I actually liked it (except for a slight inconsistancy toward the end of the film, and the cheesiness of Harry's last line).

Oh and apparently I look hot and italian, according to this random guy called Carlos. That was wierd :p *lol*

kirukurusukuri :)

I'm soooo guna hate Harry Potter.

Oh well. Better get ready.
